short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks Xiaohongshu feed while keeping search and post functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Once installed, this extension hides the recommendation feed on the Xiaohongshu homepage while keeping the search functionality intact. It helps you stay focused and find the information you need without distractions from recommendations.
